Tunable.name: ApplyQuadraticLevel
Tunable.description: When applying the SSAO, the used level will be interpolated between the read value and its squared value..

Tunable.name: DropShadowAttLevelInSsao
Tunable.display: Drop Shadow Attenuation Level In Ssao Zone
Tunable.description: When applying the drop shadow attenuation on a pre-ssao-attenuated pixel, use this value in place of the drop shadow generated value.

Tunable.name: ExpansionFactor
Tunable.description: After filtering, a purely 2D expansion pass is possible if this value is non zero, then the larger it is, the wider it expands.

Tunable.name: Max_Distance_0
Tunable.description: Max Near distance (camera to character)

Tunable.name: Max_Distance_1
Tunable.description: Max Middle distance (character to middle range)

Tunable.name: Max_Distance_2
Tunable.description: Max Far distance (background)

Tunable.name: Max_DistToTarget
Tunable.description: When the distance between camera and shadow target is greater or equal to that value, the above 'Max' tuning values will be used.

Tunable.name: Max_Falloff_0
Tunable.description: Max Near Falloff (camera to character)

Tunable.name: Max_Falloff_1
Tunable.description: Max Middle Falloff (character to middle range)

Tunable.name: Max_Falloff_2
Tunable.description: Max Far Falloff (background)

Tunable.name: Max_FilterSize_0
Tunable.description: Max Near new distance based filter size (camera to character)

Tunable.name: Max_FilterSize_1
Tunable.description: Max Middle new distance based filter size (character to middle range)

Tunable.name: Max_FilterSize_2
Tunable.description: Max Far new distance based filter size (background)

Tunable.name: Max_Intensity_0
Tunable.description: Max Near Intensity (camera to character)

Tunable.name: Max_Intensity_1
Tunable.description: Max Middle Intensity (character to middle range)

Tunable.name: Max_Intensity_2
Tunable.description: Max Far Intensity (background)

Tunable.name: Max_MaxIntensity
Tunable.description: Max Final ssao intensity range max, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting

Tunable.name: Max_MaxIntensityExteriorFloor
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Max Exterior Floor
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range max, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of exterior floors

Tunable.name: Max_MaxIntensityExteriorWall
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Max Exterior Wall
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range max, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of exterior walls

Tunable.name: Max_MaxIntensityInteriorFloor
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Max Interior Floor
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range max, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of interior floors

Tunable.name: Max_MaxIntensityInteriorWall
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Max Interior Wall
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range max, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of interior walls

Tunable.name: Max_MinIntensity
Tunable.description: Max Final ssao intensity range min, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting

Tunable.name: Max_MinIntensityExteriorFloor
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Min Exterior Floor
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range min, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of exterior floors

Tunable.name: Max_MinIntensityExteriorWall
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Min Exterior Wall
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range min, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of exterior walls

Tunable.name: Max_MinIntensityInteriorFloor
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Min Interior Floor
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range min, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of interior floors

Tunable.name: Max_MinIntensityInteriorWall
Tunable.display: Max Apply Range Min Interior Wall
Tunable.description: Final ssao intensity range min, controls the ssao being applied to the lighting of interior walls

Tunable.name: Max_Radius_0
Tunable.description: Max Near radius (camera to character)

Tunable.name: Max_Radius_1
Tunable.description: Max Middle radius (character to middle range)

Tunable.name: Max_Radius_2
Tunable.description: Max Far radius (background)

Tunable.name: Max_SubIntensity
Tunable.description: Max Sub Intensity scaler

Tunable.name: Max_SubScale
Tunable.description: Max Sub Radius scaler

Tunable.name: Min_Distance_0
Tunable.description: Near distance (camera to character)

Tunable.name: Min_Distance_1
Tunable.description: Middle distance (character to middle range)

Tunable.name: Min_Distance_2
Tunable.description: Far distance (background)

Tunable.name: Min_DistToTarget
Tunable.description: When the distance between camera and target is less or equal to that value, the above 'Min' tuning values will be used. If that distance is between 'Min Dist to target' and 'Max Dist to target', interpolated between 'Min' and 'Max' tuning values will be used

Tunable.name: Min_SubScale

Tunable.name: NewExpansionFactor1
Tunable.description: In distance based filtering, a purely 2D expansion pass is possible if this value is non zero, then the larger it is, the wider it expands.

Tunable.name: NewExpansionFactor2
Tunable.description: In distance based filtering, if >=0, a second filtering pass is performed. Then, this acts as the above field, for that second pass.

Tunable.name: UseDistanceBasedSsaoFiltering
Tunable.display: Use New Distance Based Ssao Filtering
Tunable.description: Turn on the new distance based filtering passes in place of the regular filtering + optional expansion pass

Tunable.name: UseSmallSizeForSsao
Tunable.description: Use a fixed size to render the SSAO texture (instead of a half viewport size, so the ssao looks the same at all game resolution. It won't visibly shrink when the resolution increases but won't be more accurate either.
